verses.roman:
calite caraṇe nūpura bāje jhanjhan
śuni' camakita haila pitā-mātāra mana

synonyms: calite—while going; caraṇe—on the lotus feet; nūpura—ankle bells; bāje—sounded; jhanjhan—tinkling; śuni'-hearing; camakita—struck with wonder; haila—became; pitā—of His father; mātāra—and mother; mana—the minds.
translation: When the child was going out, there was a tinkling of ankle bells from His lotus feet. Hearing this, His father and mother were struck with wonder.
